1.name: Illusion of Vulnerability
1.desc: Inflict vulnerability when you interrupt a foe.

2.name: Dazzling
2.desc: Dazing a foe also applies vulnerability.

3.name: Fragility
3.desc: Deal 10% increased damage to vulnerable foes.

1.name: Confounding Suggestions
1.desc: 100% Chance to inflict stun whenever you daze a target. Increased daze duration by 25%.

2.name: Empowered Illusions
2.desc: Illusions deal 15% more damage.

3.name: Rendering Shatter
3.desc: Shattering illusions inflicts vulnerability on nearby foes.

1.name: Shattered Concentration
1.desc: Shatter skills also remove a boon on hit.

2.name: Blurred Inscriptions
2.desc: Activating a signet also grant you distortion and removes conditions. Signet recharge is also reduced by 20%.

3.name: Furious Interruption
3.desc: Gain quickness when you interrupt a foe.

1.name: Greatsword Training
1.desc: 100 Increased power while wielding a greatsword. Reduce 2% recharge on greatsword skills whenever you or an illusion hits with Spatial Surge.

2.name: Mental Torment
2.desc: Shattered skills deal 25% more damage. This damage increase is doubled against foes that are not activating skills.

3.name: Power Block
3.desc: Interrupts deal damage and inflicts weakness. Enemy skills that you interrupt have an increased cooldown.

1.name: Critical Infusion
1.desc: Gain vigor when delivering a critical hit.

2.name: Sharper Images
2.desc: Illusions inflict bleeding on critical hits.

3.name: Confusing Combatants
3.desc: You and your illusions inflict confusion when you critical hit.

1.name: Phantasmal Fury
1.desc: Your phantasms have fury.

2.name: Desperate Decoy
2.desc: Cloak and leave a clone of yourself behind if you take damage while below health threshold (50%).

3.name: Duelist Discipline
3.desc: Pistol attacks from you and your illusions have a chance to cause bleeding. Interrupting a foe recharges pistol skills by 50%.

1.name: Blinding Dissipation
1.desc: Blind foes around you whenever you use a shatter skill.

2.name: Evasive Mirror
2.desc: Gain a barrier that reflects projectiles after a successful evasion.

3.name: Blade Training
3.desc: Increased 50 precision while wielding a one-handed sword or spear. Reduces 20% recharge on sword and spear skills.

1.name: Harmonious Mantras
1.desc: Mantras can be activated 3 times before needing to be channeled again. Activating a mantra give a 4% stacking ferocity bonus.

2.name: Mistrust
2.desc: Whenever you interrupt a foe inflict confusion in an area around them.

3.name: Deceptive Evasion
3.desc: Create a clone at your current position when you dodge.

1.name: Metaphysical Rejuvenation
1.desc: Gain regeneration when your health drops below the threshold (75%).

2.name: Illusionary Membrane
2.desc: Gain protection when you gain regeneration.

3.name: Chaotic Persistence
3.desc: Each boon on you increases the duration of outgoing boons and conditions.

1.name: Descent into Madness
1.desc: Create a chaos storm when you take falling damage. Take 50% less damage from falling.

2.name: Illusionary Defense
2.desc: Take 3% reduced damage for each illusion you have in the world.

3.name: Master of Manipulation
3.desc: When you use a manipulation skill, gain mirror for a short duration. Reduces recharge on manipulation skills by 20%.

1.name: Mirror of Anguish
1.desc: When disabled, you mirror the disabling effect back to its source.

2.name: Chaotic Transference
2.desc: Gain 10% condition damage based on your toughness.

3.name: Chaotic Dampening
3.desc: Chaos Armor grants protection. Staff and trident skills recharge faster while you have chaos armor.

1.name: Chaotic Interruption
1.desc: When you interrupt a foe you immobilize them and gain Might. You then gain an additional random boon while your target gains a random condition.

2.name: Prismatic Understanding
2.desc: Increased stealth duration from mesmer skills. Gain random boons while you are stealthed.

3.name: Bountiful Disillusionment
3.desc: When you use a shatter gain stability. Then you and all nearby allies gain a unique boon based on what shatter was used.

1.name: Persisting Images
1.desc: Phantasms have 20% increased health and spawn with retaliation.

2.name: Protected Phantasms
2.desc: Phantasms gain distortion briefly upon creation.

3.name: Phantasmal Healing
3.desc: Phantasms grant regeneration to nearby allies. Your healing power is increased by 100 for each illusion you control.

1.name: Medic’s Feedback
1.desc: Create a feedback bubble while reviving an ally. Your revive speed is increased by 10%.

2.name: Mender’s Purity
2.desc: Cast Power Cleanse when you use a healing skill. Heal allies around you when you finish preparing a mantra.

3.name: Vigorous Revelation
3.desc: Shattering illusions grants vigor to nearby allies.

1.name: Warden’s Feedback
1.desc: Focus weapon skills reflect projectiles. Reduces recharge on focus weapon skills by 20%.

2.name: Restorative Illusions
2.desc: Heal a small amount when you shatter illusions.

3.name: Compounding Celerity
3.desc: Move 10% faster for each active illusion. Gain swiftness whenever an illusion shatters.

1.name: Shattered Conditions
1.desc: Using a shatter skill removes a condition from you and allies around you.

2.name: Illusionary Inspiration
2.desc: Whenever you summon a phantasm, cast Signet of Inspiration.

3.name: Temporal Enchanter
3.desc: Glamour skills last longer. When an ally enters or exits a glamour they gain super speed.

1.name: Illusionary Retribution
1.desc: All Shatter skills inflict confusion.

2.name: Illusionist’s Celerity
2.desc: Reduce recharge on illusion-summoning skills by 20%

3.name: Shattered Strength
3.desc: Shattering illusions grant you might per illusion. Shatters recharge 15% faster.

1.name: Compounding Power
1.desc: Gain 3% increased damage for each of your active illusions.

2.name: Persistence of Memory
2.desc: Shattering a phantasm recharges all phantasms by a small amount (2%).

3.name: The Pledge
3.desc: Torch skills remove conditions. Torch skills recharge 1.5% faster while you are in stealth.

1.name: Sum of All Fears
1.desc: When you apply 5 or more stacks of confusion on a target you also apply torment.

2.name: Phantasmal Haste
2.desc: Phantasms attack more often (20% reduction on recharge).

3.name: Malicious Sorcery
3.desc: Torment deals 50% increased damage to moving foes. Reduces 2% recharge on scepter skills when you inflict confusion.

1.name: Blinding Befuddlement
1.desc: Cause confusion when you blind a foe. Confusion lasts longer.

2.name: Master of Fragmentation
2.desc: Your shatter skills are improved.

3.name: Maim the Disillusioned
3.desc: Enemies hit by shatter skills are inflicted with torment.

1.name: Time Splitter
1.desc: Gain access to continuum split/shift which allows you to revert to an earlier point in time.

2.name: Flow of Time
2.desc: Gain alacrity when you shatter. (1s)

3.name: Time Marches On
3.desc: You move 25% faster. The duration of incoming movement-impairing conditions is reduced by 25%. (Cripple. Chilled, Immobilize)

1.name: Time Catches Up
1.desc: Activating a shatter gives your illusions Super Speed.

2.name: Delayed Reactions
2.desc: Interrupting a foe slows them. (3s of Slow)

3.name: All’s Well that Ends Well
3.desc: Wells remove conditions from allies when they end. (1 condition)

1.name: Illusionary Reversion
1.desc: Gain a clone after you activate a shatter skill.

2.name: Improved Alacrity
2.desc: Alacrity applied to you lasts longer. (33%)

3.name: Danger Time
3.desc: Gain additional critical hit chance against slowed enemies. (30%)

1.name: Lost Time
1.desc: Every 3rd critical hit will slow your target. (2s of Slow)

2.name: Chronophantasma
2.desc: Your phantasms respawn the first time they are shattered.

3.name: Seize The Moment
3.desc: Gain quickness for each illusion you shatter. (1s of Quickness)
